select t.*,d.devicename,iv.status,iv.downtime from DA_CUSTLIMIT t left join da_device d on t.deviceid=d.deviceid left join t_iv_devcust iv on t.deviceid=iv.deviceid and t.opercode=iv.operid and t.stuempno=iv.thirdid
and t.opercode = #{opercode}
and t.custname like concat(concat('%',#{custname}),'%')
and t.stuempno like concat(concat('%',#{stuempno}),'%')
select * from DA_CUSTLIMIT where stuempno = #{stuempno} and deviceid = #{deviceid} and opercode = #{opercode}
